name: tina-cms-tests
description: Test suite for TinaCMS cache bypass and Git operations

scripts.test:cache: node -e "const Test = require('./comprehensive-tina-test.js'); const t = new Test(); t.testCacheBypass().catch(console.error);"
scripts.test:git: node -e "const Test = require('./comprehensive-tina-test.js'); const t = new Test(); t.testGitOperations().catch(console.error);"
scripts.test:performance: node -e "const Test = require('./comprehensive-tina-test.js'); const t = new Test(); t.testPerformanceComparison().catch(console.error);"
scripts.test:limitations: node -e "const Test = require('./comprehensive-tina-test.js'); const t = new Test(); t.testLimitations().catch(console.error);"

author: TinaCMS POC Team
